column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Ose Sigun needs help growing mushrooms.
Slay an undine for its heart.
Slay a phooka for its blood.
Slay a psammead for its silk.
Deliver the items to Ose Sigun.
Tell me, mortal─do you know what a “pla enni” is?
It's the name of not only our village, but a mushroom. A variety that is exceptionally difficult to grow.
Some special items are needed in their cultivation, and I would be grateful if you could procure them for me.
Specifically, what I require is an undine heart, a bottle of phooka blood, and a ball of psammead silk. Suffice it to say, you'll be suitably rewarded for your troubles.
An undine heart, a bottle of phooka blood, and a ball of psammead silk─these are the items needed to cultivate pla enni mushrooms. Please procure them for me.
There you are. Were you able to obtain the items I requested?
Excellent! With these, we can ensure that the pla enni grow big and strong!

How do we use the items, you ask? We give the mushrooms water purified with the undine heart, and fertilize them with nutrient-rich phooka blood. And as they grow, we reinforce them with psammead silk.
Add some windows and doors, perhaps a flight of stairs, and it is ready to live in. My thanks, mortal. Here is your fitting reward.
